title: Osman Hadi's condition extremely critical, says Singapore foreign minister
body: Hadi, a frontline fighter of the July uprising and spokesperson of Inquilab Mancha, is receiving treatment at a hospital in Singapore. Singapore’s Foreign Minister Dr Vivian Balakrishnan has described Sharif Osman Hadi’s condition as “extremely critical.” Balakrishnan called Chief Adviser Professor Muhammad Yunus at 9:40pm on Wednesday and breifed him on Hadi’s health. Hadi, a frontline fighter of the July uprising and spokesperson of Inquilab Mancha, is receiving treatment at a hospital in Singapore. The chief adviser urged the public to remain calm and pray for Hadi’s recovery.
